mapper.select: SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, hire_date, job_id FROM employees WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEES ( employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, hire_date, job_id, profile ) VALUES( ( select nvl(max(employee_id),0)+1 from employees ), #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{hireDate}, #{jobId}, #{profile} )
mapper.select: SELECT first_name from employees where employee_id = #{value}
